hero.title_line1: Start with $0 – Sell global products, earn profit!
hero.description: Choose from a catalog of trending products, and we'll handle storage, delivery, and customer service... All you need to do is focus on selling and earning.
hero.footer_note: Join over 2000 sellers making daily sales without needing capital or a registered company.

whyChooseUs.title: No Risk. Just Results.
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Skip the risks, keep the profits. Jamla.ma makes e-commerce simple, fast, and stress-free.

cards.title: Zero Investment
cards.description: Start earning immediately without any upfront costs or inventory investment.

cards.title: Instant Setup
cards.description: Get your store running in minutes, not weeks of development and setup.

cards.title: No Risk
cards.description: No inventory to manage, no shipping hassles, no customer service headaches.

cards.title: Instant Payouts
cards.description: Receive your earnings within 24-48 hours of confirmed sales.

cards.title: Built-in Audience
cards.description: Access our marketplace of active buyers looking for products to purchase.

cards.title: Full Support
cards.description: We handle all customer service, returns, and technical support for you.

howItWorks.title: Discover How Easy It Is
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple guide that walks you through every step to success.

steps.title: Create Your Account
steps.description: Sign up quickly with just a few clicks and join our seller community.

steps.title: Select Trending Products
steps.description: Browse and pick the best products that match your audience and style.

steps.title: Start Selling Seamlessly
steps.description: List your products and watch your sales grow effortlessly.

steps.title: Receive Your Payments Fast
steps.description: Get paid securely and promptly after every successful sale.

featuredproducts.featured_description: Discover a variety of products including clothing, accessories, and much more — all in one place.
